about.title: SPA
about.description: We are dedicated to providing the best spa experience
about.mainText: Serenity is more than a spa, it's a promise of tranquility. Located in [Location], we specialize in offering personalized wellness experiences that rejuvenate the body and calm the mind.
about.secondaryText: With a passionate team and the finest products, we transform your time into accessible luxury. Your journey to relaxation begins here.

services.title: SPA SERVICES
services.description: Here are our spa services described

therapeutic.title: Therapeutic Massages
therapeutic.description: Our therapeutic massages help relax muscles, relieve stress, and improve circulation.

subServices.title: Swedish Massage
subServices.description: Deep relaxation to relieve muscle tension.

subServices.title: Lymphatic Drainage
subServices.description: Gentle technique to stimulate the lymphatic system and detoxify.

subServices.title: Sports Massage
subServices.description: Focus on specific areas for muscle recovery.

signature.title: Signature Collection
signature.description: Exclusive experience of premium treatments inspired by ancient rituals and modern techniques.

subServices.title: Ancient Ritual
subServices.description: Full body treatment with exotic essential oils.

subServices.title: Diamond Experience
subServices.description: Facial and body treatment with high-end products and colloidal gold.

facial.title: Facial Treatments
facial.description: Care for your skin with natural products and professional techniques that restore its luminosity.

subServices.title: Deep Cleansing
subServices.description: Removal of impurities and blackheads for fresh skin.

subServices.title: Hyaluronic Acid Hydration
subServices.description: Restores the hydration barrier and softens fine lines.

wellness.title: Wellness Rituals
wellness.description: Immerse yourself in a sensory experience that combines aromatherapy, music, and relaxation techniques.

subServices.title: Hot Stone Therapy
subServices.description: Combination of massage and heat for deep relaxation and pain relief.

subServices.title: Sea Salt Exfoliation
subServices.description: Removes dead cells, leaving skin soft and renewed.

technology.title: Technology
technology.text: Our company has state-of-the-art equipment and the most innovative studies for orthodontics and maxillofacial surgeries.

locations.title: Locations
locations.text: We currently have a presence in two locations in Tijuana, as well as branches in Rosarito, Tecate, and Ensenada.

medical.title: Medical Care
medical.text: Our doctors provide personalized care, building trust and ensuring quality service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to help. Send us a message and we'll get back to you shortly.
contact.name: Name

footer.description: Dental imaging and diagnostic clinic, offering state-of-the-art studies in Tijuana, Tecate, Rosarito, and Ensenada.
